"Lynce": "Hey, are you one of those Aelio Region ARKS?"
"We're really short on manpower right now, so I have a favor to ask you. You don't mind, do you?"

"Oh. Well, if that's your answer...
Are you sure I can't convince you?"
"I need you to go and get some Tames meat. The people here should recover in no time if they can get some meat to eat."
"I know I'm asking you to go out of your way for me, but we really need this. Take care of yourself out there."
"Thank you. That should be more than enough to turn into a healthy, nutritious meal."
"I hate to keep asking you for help, but could you give it to my supervisor, Marlynn?"
